summary: Adds a very basic follower called Runa, mostly for those focused on female screen-archery.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][font=Georgia][i][b]- Update 1.1:[/b] Corrected (hopefully) a problem where she had invisible/purple body and a default face. She's now naked.

[b]- Update 1.2:[/b] Fixed a problem where the body would use the skin textures installed by the user and not the ones provided with the follower. She's still naked, so be kind and give her some warm clothes.

[b]- Update 1.3:[/b] Now with clothes. Also I removed the pretentious "standalone" statement since it requires XPMS (at least in my game, idk. Again, I'm really bad at this! Also, I removed the Racemenu Face Preset file entirely from the Nexus.

[b][center]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/b][/i]
So, here's the deal: A lot of people asked me in the past to release this character as a follower, and when i say 'a lot' i mean like 2 or 3. This is my very first follower so I'm sure there will be problems, in which case let me know and I'll try to fix them asap although I'm really bad at this.

Do you want her for Newrim (SSE)? [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/16608]Here you go[/url], make sure to thank [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/40101665]bchick3[/url] for her work.[/font]

[b][center]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/b]
[font=Georgia]- Name: Runa[/font]
[font=Georgia]- Weight: 100[/font]
[font=Georgia]- Race: Nord[/font]
[font=Georgia]- Marriable: Yes[/font]
[font=Georgia]- Body type: 7BUNP (UUNP family)[/font]
[font=Georgia]- No spells, no traits, no nothing. As I said, it's a very basic follower intended mostly for screenshots but I'm sure that given time she'll do just fine at your side on your adventures.[/font]

[font=Georgia]Where can i find her? She spends her days at the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood, waiting for someone to take her on a photoshoot session.[/font]

[font=Georgia]If you install this follower, don't keep her all to yourself. Share some screenshots with the rest of us.[/font]

[u][center][font=Georgia]If you like the follower, please don't forget to [color=#6aa84f]Endorse[/color] it so more people can discover it.[/font]
[font=Georgia]On the contrary if you don't like it, feel free to leave a suggestion.[/font][/center][/u]
[b][center]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/b]
[font=Georgia]See her in action

[youtube]aBGiymLuXRU[/youtube][/font]

[b][center]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/b]
[u]FAQ (I guess... just in case)[/u]

[b][color=#ffd966]Q: CBBE body?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Nope.[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: Glossiness/Oily body?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Some of the screenshots have the glossiness but don't worry, she won't have it when you install the mod. If you want to add it, check [/font][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JUIPImauPhY]this video[/url][font=Georgia].[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: Will you release some of your other characters on to the wild?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Eventually.[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: What ENB are you using?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Snapdragon Prime[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: What mod is that gray room on the screenshots from?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: Aether Suite.[/font]
[b][color=#ffd966]Q: Can you upload it to "X" website?[/color][/b]
[font=Georgia]A: I can but i won't. Nexus is perfectly fine and objectively the best mod site in the entire internet. If you don't like it, i don't know what you're doing here.[/font]

[b][color=#e69138][u]Outfits used on the screenshots:[/u][/color][/b] [i]MiniBikini from GomaPero, The Book Of UUNP (Tavern Clothes), Merta Assassin Armor, Gotha Rensa, Luxurious Seduction, Skull Armor from TERA Armors, Lind's Marksmage Garb, Crystal Rose Armor, Nezzar's Ultimate Lingerie Collection.[/i]

[font=Georgia]- - Please ignore the name of the .esp as she is NOT a standalone follower. I simply forgot to change the name and didn't want to go back and do that all over again. Thanks - -[/font]
[b][center]
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/b]
[u]Huge Thanks to:[/u]

[font=Georgia]Caliente Ousnius and Jeir for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url]
Expired for [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]Racemenu[/url]
[font=Georgia]Groovtama for[/font] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url]
[font=Georgia]HHaleyy for [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]FairSkinComplexion[/url]
[font=Georgia]Kalilies for [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos[/url]
[font=Georgia]nerune for [/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056]Mikan Eyes
[/url][font=Georgia]Gamefever - ousnius - ChronoTrigger77 for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69562]Remodeled Armor for UUNP[/url][/font][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/36896260]
Brandiibuck[/url][font=Georgia] for the name suggestion a long time ago :)[/font][/size]

[size=4][font=Georgia][center]- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -[/center][/font][/size]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90822][img]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/867/27690028768_39aeffef9a_o.png[/img][/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90873][img]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/842/27756483238_8d0714c335_o.png[/img][/url] [size=4][font=Georgia]More coming...[/font][/size]
author: germanware
